StringTable.Name: $CARE_CAM_CAP-START
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Record video|Start recording$}{$CP936=录制视频|开始录制$}{$CP950=錄製視訊|開始錄製$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_CAM_STOP
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Stop screen capture$}{$CP936=停止屏幕采集$}{$CP950=停止熒幕擷取$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_GUIDE_BTNTIP
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Click to start$}{$CP936=点击开始使用$}{$CP950=點擊開始使用$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_GUIDE_TEXT
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Click the logo below to start$}{$CP936=点击下方图标开始使用$}{$CP950=點擊下方標識開始使用$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_GUIDE_TEXT_PLAYING
StringTable.String: {$CP0=On Screen Control is not enabled$}{$CP936=未启用图层式皮肤输出$}{$CP950=未啟用圖層式面板輸出$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_MAIN_MAX-FULL
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Maximize|Full Screen$}{$CP936=最大化|全屏$}{$CP950=最大化|全螢幕$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_MAIN_MIN-MINI_MODE
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Minimize|Mini Mode$}{$CP936=最小化|迷你模式$}{$CP950=最小化|迷你模式$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_MAIN_MIN-MINI_WINDOW
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Minimize|Minimum size$}{$CP936=最小化|迷你尺寸$}{$CP950=最小化|迷你大小$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_MAIN_ONTOP_CYCLE
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Cycle on top$}{$CP936=切换最前端$}{$CP950=切換最上層顯示$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_MAIN_OPEN_FILE-FOLDER
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Open file|folder$}{$CP936=打开 文件|文件夹$}{$CP950=開啟 檔案|資料夾$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_MAIN_PLAY_LIST-CYCLE
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Playlist|Repeat$}{$CP936=播放列表|播放模式$}{$CP950=播放清單|播放模式$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_PLAYLIST_ATTACH
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Attach Playlist$}{$CP936=吸附播放列表$}{$CP950=吸附播放清單$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_PLAYLIST_DETACH
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Detach Playlist$}{$CP936=拆分播放列表$}{$CP950=分離播放清單$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_PLAYLIST_SAVE
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Save the playlist$}{$CP936=保存播放列表$}{$CP950=儲存播放清單$}

StringTable.Name: $CARE_WINDOW_ONTOP
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Stay on top of main window$}{$CP936=总在主窗口最前端$}{$CP950=該視窗最上層顯示$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE_FINDWND
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Choose window to capture$}{$CP936=选择窗口$}{$CP950=選擇視窗$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE_FULLSCREEN
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Capture in full screen size$}{$CP936=截取全屏$}{$CP950=擷取全熒幕$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE_NORMALSCREEN
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Capture in default size$}{$CP936=截取主画面$}{$CP950=擷取主畫面$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE_OPTIMIZE_SIZE
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Optimize size/Restore size$}{$CP936=自适应/之前尺寸$}{$CP950=自適應/先前大小$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE_PIP_SETTING
StringTable.String: {$CP0=PIP(Picture In Picture) Settings$}{$CP936=画中画设置$}{$CP950=畫中畫設定$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE1ST_HIDE
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Hide camera 1$}{$CP936=隐藏1号镜头$}{$CP950=隱藏1號鏡頭$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE1ST_PRIMARY_OFF
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Camera 1 is primary$}{$CP936=已将1号镜头设为主画面来源$}{$CP950=已將1號鏡頭設為主畫面來源$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE1ST_PRIMARY_ON
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Make camera 1 primary$}{$CP936=使用1号镜头作为主画面来源$}{$CP950=使用1號鏡頭作為主畫面來源$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE1ST_SELECT_OFF
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Select camera 1$}{$CP936=使用1号镜头$}{$CP950=使用1號鏡頭$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE1ST_SELECT_ON
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Camera 1 selected$}{$CP936=1号镜头使用中$}{$CP950=1號鏡頭使用中$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE1ST_SHOW
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Show camera 1$}{$CP936=显示1号镜头$}{$CP950=顯示1號鏡頭$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE2ND_PRIMARY_ON
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Make camera 2 primary$}{$CP936=使用2号镜头作为主画面来源$}{$CP950=使用2號鏡頭作為主畫面來源$}

StringTable.Name: $CMD_CAPTURE2ND_SELECT_OFF
StringTable.String: {$CP0=Select camera 2$}{$CP936=使用2号镜头$}{$CP950=使用2號鏡頭$}
